noble_returns.speaker: Narrator
noble_returns.text: The Masked Noble has become a regular visitor, always arriving precisely as the afternoon light turns golden. Today, they seem particularly interested in your menu.

noble_request.speaker: The Masked Noble
noble_request.text: Your cuisine has been... unexpectedly delightful. Tell me, do you ever prepare dishes that require more... refined ingredients? I tire of the same offerings everywhere.

choices.text: I pride myself on using the finest ingredients. What did you have in mind?
Simple food, made with care, can rival any royal feast.

noble_impressed.speaker: The Masked Noble
noble_impressed.text: Excellent. I confess, in my previous life... *They pause* In other establishments, I was surrounded by the finest chefs. Yet none made food that felt like... this. Real.

noble_thoughtful.speaker: The Masked Noble
noble_thoughtful.text: *They fall silent for a moment* You're right, of course. The palace kitchens... *They stop abruptly* That is... the finest restaurants often miss that simplicity.

noble_musing.speaker: The Masked Noble
noble_musing.text: *They stare at their plate* Do you know what I envy most about common folk? No, don't look offended. I mean the freedom. To eat what you want, wear what you want, be who you want.

noble_slip.speaker: The Masked Noble
noble_slip.text: *Their voice drops* To choose your own path rather than have it chosen for you. To be valued for who you are, not what you represent.

noble_recover.speaker: The Masked Noble
noble_recover.text: *They straighten, composure returning* Forgive me. The atmosphere here invites... reflection. I shall return. This place has become... necessary.
